name: ICube Consortium Pte Ltd.
description: SolveCube is an AI talent platform with a Human touch. Inclusion of diverse talent is at the core of Solvecube's purpose- remote working, mature experts, Solopreneurs, boutique firms and boundaryless talent available full-time, part-time, short-term, or turnkey. We work with business leaders of small, big and large enterprises to revolutionize talent sourcing. We use technology to enable talent discovery backed by a tailor-made people strategy.
features: Independent Mid to senior level domain experts with global experience
Source mid to senior level talent for permanent roles
Access to SolveCube super aggregated skills and capability pool and AI matching engine
business_objectives: Boost Hiring Manager Confidence and Productivity
sub_categories: Software and Services Related to HR Software
Headline: AI Talent Market platform with millions of experts, short or full time Multi-domain
ShortDescription: Scaling a business is directly proportional to the People strategy & timely acquisition of fit-for-purpose talent. Our vision is to create a Super App for People and talent solutions.

Highlights.name: Large Pool of Talent
Highlights.description: SolveCube offers access to a large pool of talent . This means that they can help businesses find the qualified employees they need.

Highlights.name: AI-powered Matching Engine
Highlights.description: SolveCube uses an AI-powered matching engine to connect businesses with the best candidates for the job [1]. This can help businesses save time and money by filtering out unqualified candidates.

Highlights.name: Expertise on Demand
Highlights.description: SolveCube provides expertise on demand . This means that businesses can access the skills and knowledge of a network of experts without having to hire them full-time.

enhanced_description: SolveCube is an AI talent platform designed to revolutionize talent sourcing and discovery for enterprises. It combines advanced AI matching with a human touch to connect businesses with diverse talent, including remote workers, mature experts, solopreneurs, and boutique firms, available across various engagement models such as full-time, part-time, short-term, and turnkey projects. The platform provides access to a large, global pool of independent mid to senior-level domain experts and offers expertise on demand, enabling the timely acquisition of fit-for-purpose talent and boosting hiring manager productivity.
key_use_cases: Hiring mid to senior-level talent for permanent roles
Acquiring diverse and flexible talent (remote, short-term, part-time)
competitive_advantages: AI-powered matching engine for efficient candidate selection
Access to a large, super aggregated pool of diverse talent (remote, mature, solopreneurs, boutique firms)
Offering flexible talent engagement models (full-time, part-time, short-term, turnkey)
Focus on independent mid to senior level domain experts with global experience
Combines AI with a human touch
hr_functions_supported: Talent Management (related to acquisition and discovery)
roi_benefits: Increased hiring manager confidence and productivity
Time and cost savings through efficient candidate filtering
Timely acquisition of fit-for-purpose talent, supporting business scaling
Access to expertise without the need for full-time hiring, offering cost flexibility
scalability_features: Access to a large pool of talent
